name: auto-documenter
description: Automatic documentation system that creates contextual memory for Claude Code
author: Nick Linnell

commands.doc-init: Initialize documentation structure in the current project
commands.doc-feature: Document a specific feature with context and gotchas
commands.doc-update: Update existing documentation based on recent changes
commands.doc-plan: Save a planning session to the docs/plans/ directory

agents.doc-manager: Maintains documentation index and manages doc structure
